definition: Teachers' Day (September 10th in PRC and Confucius's birthday, September 28th in Taiwan)
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: September 10th is the Teachers'Day of China.
The day is celebrated as Teachers Day in the country with great enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 教師節這一天，全國上下都以極大的熱情來慶祝。

sentences.english: What is the motif of this year?
sentences.chinese: 知道今年教師節的主題嗎？

sentences.english: Have you ever sent gifts to your teachers?
sentences.chinese: 教師節，你給老師送過禮嗎？

sentences.english: Teachers＇ Day comes on September 10th every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年的九月十日是教師節。

sentences.english: Latvia celebrate Teachers'Day on the first Sunday of October.
sentences.chinese: 拉托維亞的教師節是在10月份的第一個星期日。
今天是玄月十日，教師節。

sentences.english: The first Teachers Day was held in 1957.
sentences.chinese: 1957年泰國人慶祝了第一個教師節。

sentences.english: This is Teachers‘ Day and a time to be grateful to all teachers.
sentences.chinese: 時逢教師節，是向所有教師表達謝意的日子。

sentences.english: The day is declared as a holiday in schools.
sentences.chinese: 在泰國，教師節作爲學校的節日來慶祝。
今年應該是第24個教師節。

sentences.english: She was one of initiators of "Teachers' Day" in China.
sentences.chinese: 陳香梅女士是中國教師節的發起人之一。

sentences.english: At this time of Teachers Day, we sincerely wish you happiness.
sentences.chinese: 在教師節來臨之際，我們衷心地向您祝福。

sentences.english: In the ancient times, Kongzi’s birthday was regarded as a Teachers'Day.
sentences.chinese: 在古代的時候，人們把孔子的生辰作爲教師節。

sentences.english: Today is teacher's day, and for the first time and is a Senior High School teachers' day.
sentences.chinese: 今天是教師節，而且是高中第一次過的教師節。

definition: Arbor Day (March 12th), also known as National Tree Planting Day 全民義務植樹日|全民义务植树日[Quan2 min2 Yi4 wu4 Zhi2 shu4 ri4]
old calendar/the Chinese lunar calendar/same as 農曆|农历[nong2 li4]
to shut down/to terminate/to cancel/to go out of business
Yongchun County in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian
Double Tenth, the anniversary of the Wuchang Uprising 武昌起義|武昌起义[Wu3 chang1 Qi3 yi4] of October 10th, 1911/(Tw) National Day
junior high school (Tw)/abbr. to 國中|国中[guo2 zhong1]
Saga county, Tibetan: Sa dga' rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet
